title: New Booster Shot Targets Covid Variants More Effectively, Pfizer Says
description: Federal officials are hoping that encouraging new findings will spur more Americans to get an updated booster before a feared surge in coronavirus cases this winter.
dc:creator: Sharon LaFraniere
media:description: Only about 8 percent of Americans ages 5 and up have received the new boosters from Pfizer and Moderna since they were introduced in September.
